B C D E I O P R S U X Y

B

BouncingBall - Class in ex52
BouncingBall animated applet.
BouncingBall() - Constructor for class ex52.BouncingBall
 
bouncingThread - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Thread that refreshes screen every delay seconds.

C

color - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Color of ball

D

d - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Variable used to hold applet's dimensions.
delay - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Refresh rate of bouncing ball.
dx - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Variable that determines pixel amount of horizontal movement of the ball per delay time
dy - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Variable that determines pixel amount of vertical movement of the ball per delay time

E

ex52 - package ex52
The ex52 package is package contains BouncingBall example applet from Xiaoping Jia's Object-Oriented Software Development Using Java.

I

image - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Image to show actual ball.
init() - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
Initial method called after applet initialized.

O

offscreen - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Graphics object used to implement off-screen drawing.

P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
This method is called implicitly by the thread that updates screen to create animation.

R

radius - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Radius of ball
run() - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
Runs an infinite loop.

S

start() - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
Initializes animation by initializing bouncingThread and activating it.
stop() - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
Stop animation.

U

update(Graphics) - Method in class ex52.BouncingBall
Calculate the new location of the ball.

X

x - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
X coordinate of center of the ball

Y

y - Variable in class ex52.BouncingBall
Y coordinate of center of the ball
